website_summaries.verdict: A cozy fleece throw that comes in a variety of colors.
pros: A great lightweight throw with neatly finished edging
cons: Prone to shedding and pilling, especially after being washed a few times

customer_reviews.title: Soft, washes well
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so soft! I get cold easily, so I got this to put under my comforter. I saw a couple of reviews about the blanket getting ruined after washing, but I washed it and it’s fine. The directions say to wash with cold water and hang dry. I actually ended up just throwing it in the dryer on the “air only” setting (no heat) and the blanket is still soft and intact. It fits perfectly for a queen-sized bed and the color is pretty true to what is shown. The stitching on the trim is of pretty good quality, so it should hold up pretty well in future washes.
customer_reviews.author: Let's Keep It Real

customer_reviews.title: I love this very soft blanket
customer_reviews.text: I really love this blanket, though I wish I could get a nicer color for this price. I ordered the queen-size, which gives me plenty of room to wrap up in. It is super-soft, and the edges are finished with 1/2 inch border, which looks like it will hold up well. I have fibromyalgia, which makes my skin extremely sensitive. I am very picky about having super soft blankets. This one fits the bill quite nicely, in fact I'm going to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mind WandererTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Blanket shed horribly
customer_reviews.text: At first glance it was a nice blanket but it shed horribly making a mess all over the house. It got worse every time you washed it. Horrible horrible purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: I tried washing once again thinking maybe it was just a fluke and the second wash made it even worse.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket was nothing but a fuzz ball after one wash! There is balled up lint on the entire blanket, I tried washing once again thinking maybe it was just a fluke and the second wash made it even worse.
customer_reviews.author: mso

customer_reviews.title: Shedding
customer_reviews.text: Started shedding upon first use. Small fabric pills all over...
customer_reviews.author: Logan Rotolo

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to dark grey (slightly greenish too)
customer_reviews.text: I cant comment on the other colors, but be aware that the "dark grey" version is not even close to matching what is listed in the pictures. Its about 30% brighter than the listed grey, with a 5-10% greenish cast. I'd return it, but it is comfortable and I need something warm right now. It is in other respects good. Warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: f0ckamazon

customer_reviews.title: Feel misled; this was the top "sponsored ad" when I searched electric blanket.
customer_reviews.text: When I searched for electric blanket last year, this was the top "sponsored" result. In my naivete and ignorance, I thought that meant it fulfilled my search requests. (Spoiler alert: it didn't. It is just a regular blanket.) I gave it 2 stars. It is completely my fault for not having thoroughly read to understand this was just a regular blanket. But for the price? I am not happy even with it just as a regular blanket. It is decently soft, but not large and luxurious enough to justify that price for a simple blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfy, but pills in the wash
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this since we wanted to replace our blankets that were getting a little itchy to the touch and it is very soft. The touch we love. It's nice and big and warm. I will most likely buy another one or two of them. The only downfall is, I washed it when we received it because it smelled of something strong must be from where it shipped and on the first wash it was already pilling a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality fleece blanket. GSM stands for grams per square meter, and 330 is a pretty high count. It measured out to slightly bigger than the 90 x 90 it was listed at. Both sides are soft, but one side has a furrier feel. This is an excellent blanket for the price.
customer_reviews.author: wei

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft!!! Awesome blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is amazing! Just heavy enough to give you that hug feeling, and it is super soft! Perfect for the couch to snuggle up with and watch a movie!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but warm
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and warm without being too heavy. Was a gift for someone with PAD and nerve damage in foot and phantom limb pain after an amputation. This blanket doesn’t aggravate the nerves of their legs, but keeps them warm and comfortable. Washes and drys easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell, tire factory, wtf carcinogenic chemical did they dye this with??
customer_reviews.text: This thing smells like a tire factory. I didn't even want to touch it, let alone completely unpack it for washing. I'm familiar with weird odors on new textiles, but this was beyond belief. When I think about it I shudder. If you are at all sensitive to smells, STAY AWAY.
customer_reviews.author: katchyna

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is very soft, plushy, and comfy! I bought it for my living room set. I have a similar one that is not nearly as fluffy. I haven’t had the chance to wash it yet, but I am hoping it doesn’t fade or get any less soft. The material seems to be really well made. It doesn’t peel or come loose with any force. I know where I am coming to get my next one! :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: I was going to return it but ended up keeping it because the returns aren't free and i can always use a nice big blanket
customer_reviews.text: thought htis was a heated blanket that i got my sister for a gift....didn't pay attention when i bought it - it's not also returns aren't free which is uncool. on the flip side though, the blanket is large, soft and very warm. I was going to return it but ended up keeping it because the returns aren't free and i can always use a nice big blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Placement among Electric Blankets
customer_reviews.text: One star due to deceptive advertising by/via Amazon. This item comes up among electric blankets within the search and within "similar items" when all other options are electric blankets. Not worth the hassle to return immediately during the holidays and I will definitely if any claim turns out to be false. This is not the only review that mentions this as the reason.
customer_reviews.author: juanluisgmz

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 10 months...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this blanket for months and months but a few weeks ago the stitching began to fall out. Washed this many times without any issue but for some reason one side just crapped out on me. I would think twice about buying again because of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: Warm, heavy and soft!
customer_reviews.text: It gets very cold at my work and I bought this blanket for that purpose. Got it and it is such an amazing blanket...hands down, one of the best blankets I have ever bought. It's staying home with me and I'll have to buy another blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Combs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soft blanket
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful soft blanket, the only negative is that it can definitely get you overheating if you’re prone to that. My husband has the worst time keeping cool at night, so this blanket is definitely seasonal and requires that a window be open. It also shows pet fur and dander VERY well, so f you let your animals on the bed- brace yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Super soft blanket
customer_reviews.text: TRULY AMAZED. This blanket is extremely soft; I can not believe it !! I was recommended by my friend who bought this blanket, and I was not disappointed. This blanket is perfect for the approaching winter. Its lightweight and warm! It does not easily shed, and it covers the entire bed, which means my whole body can stay warm!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Ho

customer_reviews.title: Not an electric blanket
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this shows up under the electric blanket category, it is not an electric blanket. It is not even a very warm blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket, so soft! I highly recommend. I have to add, that it has to be air dried, I missed that in the description. Even with that it is a great blanket, quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin, soft and deceptively warm
customer_reviews.text: When I first revived this I was a little put off by how thin it was. I thought it would be plush and thick. However it’s deceptively warm. I ended up only using this blanket for cold winter nights (but Southern California winters). It’s incredibly soft and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Logan D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Stay Where It Belongs
customer_reviews.text: When i opened it up its wonderfully soft and warm. But the nap of the fabric makes it travel through the night. It tends to bunch up at the top of the bed and leaves my feet cold - and instructions say dont tuck it in so I find myself pulling it back down quite often. My fear is that the pulling will harm the heating wires. It does have auto shutoff and the preheat setting is wonderful, i just hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: very soft to the touch
customer_reviews.text: If you want a soft, light blanket, this is it. It's not met to compare to the warmth of a heavy blanket but is adequate for very purposes. I put a queen size on a king bed and it works find.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzy logic

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and great value. However, it is large and heavy, probably should have just gotten the smallest size, as I only use it on the couch
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Tetreault

customer_reviews.title: In the wrong category?
customer_reviews.text: I like this blanket a lot and I really appreciate that it is so lightweight but still warm. However, I purchased it because I thought it was an electric blanket due to it showing up when I searched for those items. I’m not sure if that is an algorithm issue on Amazon’s account or if it is something in the description of the product itself. I will definitely be keeping the blanket because it’s cozy as hell, but I wish it hadn’t been mixed up with a different search.
customer_reviews.author: Avery teart

customer_reviews.title: and I should have read the product description better. That aside
customer_reviews.text: So, I thought this was an electric blanket when I ordered it (it came up on the first page of my search for electric blankets.) Turns out it's not, and I should have read the product description better. That aside, it's a really nice, warm, soft blanket that's held up to multiple washings (we have dogs.) I'd definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bolte

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is the most soft blanket I have ever bought in my entire life. I have the dark gray blanket, and it is very gorgeous, and simple, and light weight. I have absolutely no complaints, I actually ended up buying two more of these blankets because I am so obsessed. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: I love this blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket, enough to buy it again! It's seriously the softest blanket I've ever felt! I have one on my bed and one for the couch. It's so cozy, and AFFORDABLE! get one, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Teri V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blanket
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Great quality. It’s durable, and still soft months later. It’s my go to blanket. My only tip would be to wash it right when you get it, as it still has some factory residue that may irritate (But this goes for any blanket).
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Generally speaking, this is a good blanket. We hope it will last for many years.
customer_reviews.text: It feels very warm, smooth and silky. It is light weight - as described in the title, but knitted well, it does not feel cheap. Before I used it, I cleaned and dried it. It obviously had no dye bleeding, no shrinkage, nothing produced on the gauze of my dryer. Because of its lightness and warmth, it can be used as an extra layer for a cool night or outdoor activities such as picnic, camping, etc. Generally speaking, this is a good blanket. We hope it will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Nakaja

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm! I've had mine for about a year and it's just as good as the day I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: ExUmbra

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is awesome. I ordered the queen size, but probably should have gotten the king size. Either way, this blanket is warm, easy to clean and comfy. I have a cold room and used to cover up with a ton of blankets, but I only need this one now.
customer_reviews.author: David Adams

customer_reviews.title: So soft even after washing!
customer_reviews.text: Transforming my room into teal and gray and needed new blankets. This one is soft and has nice rounded corners, so no peaks at the corners when you make your bed. Even washed it and it’s still has that smooth and soft velvety touch.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Resek

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret this!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this blanket! I love everything there is about it. It is soft and comfy! I had to buy more just to have at the house!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Proszek

customer_reviews.title: Very soft  and luxurious blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a family member. They just love the blanket. Said it was exactly what they wanted.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cunha

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: It is very big and very soft! My roommates and I use this to cover the couch that my dorm gave us and it is so comfy to sit on now due to how soft it is
customer_reviews.author: James Reid

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly soft and feels so good on your skin. It’s not too hot, but still warm enough. Even after washing it it stayed soft and lovely. It’s seriously my favorite blanket I own.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: My fav blanket! Thought it was electric...but it’s not
customer_reviews.text: Initially thought it was an electric blanket...that being said I still kept it because it’s amazing. Very soft, very lightweight and keeps me super warm. It’s my new favorite blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my grandmother and she enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Cozy up and enjoy. Great blanket great price
customer_reviews.text: These are the warmest' softest, and machine and dry. You just want to hug them....really very cool product.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: ... is very warm but it has been shedding lint like crazy despite being washed twice already
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is very warm but it has been shedding lint like crazy despite being washed twice already. It's not fun when you're laying in bed and you yawn only to inhale multiple balls of lint.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a "white elephant" Christmas gift exchange. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a "white elephant" Christmas gift exchange. When I got the package and felt how soft the blanket was I contemplated keeping it for myself! Soo soft.
customer_reviews.author: kimanne

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and not electric
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 2 stars because they put this product in the ELECTRIC blanket section, but it’s not! Don’t be fooled!! Also, it’s very thin and not that warm. I gave it away and bought a thicker blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is sooooo amazing!! I have it over my couch to ...
customer_reviews.text: OMGGGGGG!!! So I took it from the box and could NOT stop touching and feeling it!!! It is sooooo amazing!! I have it over my couch to cover and I am buying another RIGHT NOW!!?
customer_reviews.author: Leesh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this blanket
customer_reviews.text: The first few weeks I used this product I was really happy with it. After washing the blanket for the first it got destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Dacalvoa22

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious softness.
customer_reviews.text: Soft and luxurious. I love this blanket. Got it during Prime Day and it feels like it cost a lot. I want more of these. The best blanket in my house.
customer_reviews.author: camper007

customer_reviews.title: So soft...
customer_reviews.text: Really soft... Wife commandeered it so not much experience with it. But the fact that should did, speaks volumes.
customer_reviews.author: Spend2Much

customer_reviews.title: The blanket is very nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is very nice and soft. When I typed in electric blankets this one kept coming up. It was partly my fault. I should have read it better. I sent them both back. I was going for and electric blanket for my daughter's. It cost me to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: I love the masks but not the shipping

customer_reviews.title: Dogs destroyed
customer_reviews.text: Loved this blanket, but tore where my dogs jumped on the bed on both sides. Wish it held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney H.

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is a steal!
customer_reviews.text: One of the warmest blankets I have ever used. Perfect for almost any occasion from sleeping to snuggling. Feels super soft and has not indicated that it will fall apart after a wash.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not electric; otherwise great product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I thought this was electric but that was my mistake. I have pleasantly surprised with a super huge and comfy blanket!
customer_reviews.author: JMIZZO

customer_reviews.title: I really like it's warmth!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm! I reallly loved how this is big enough for me as I am a really big guy. I hope to buy another one for my place at the cabin I have for my guests. I was surprised at how well packaged this was for a blanket. I thought it would come in a clear bag or very cheap as it was priced on the lower end but it came in a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: BigGuy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. It is very soft. I gave it a 4 because it sheds. It's only been washed once. Hopefully, the shedding will stop after another wash.
customer_reviews.author: QBJ

customer_reviews.title: So so so so soft
customer_reviews.text: SOFTEST BLANKET EVER. However, the title is misleading of this product because I thought I was getting an electric blanket. I searched for electric blanket and this one was one of the top search results. The only reason I didn’t return it is because it is the softest blanket I have ever touched.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Very soft, lightweight and warm! I got this blanket for my son in college, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazondotmom

customer_reviews.title: Fooled me
customer_reviews.text: Its very soft but it was in the electric blanket section and its not electric. So I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Jtamsmom5

customer_reviews.title: A Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was buying a heated blanket but I didn’t return it because of how soft it is. I’m pleased at how large it is. It actually traps in heat better than a heated blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Closet Otaku

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is much better quality than I expected. No shedding when washed as directed. And it keeps me warm all night. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia I.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t care for it.
customer_reviews.text: Not the same color as in the picture. I ordered the dark gray and it came as a light blue-ish gray with an ugly trim on it... reminds me of a hospital blanket. Returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Reibert

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than expected, but very good.
customer_reviews.text: About a month of experience. Had a little worries that queen size was too big for me in a single bed, but it doesn't bother me and rather.. fits to me. Thinner than I expected, but cozy and feels so nice. No static. Strongly recommended. :)
customer_reviews.author: Shin Dong Hyun

customer_reviews.title: Not an electric blanket... but great!
customer_reviews.text: I was dumb and thought I stumbled on the deal of a century with a queen electric blanket for under $30... however this blanket is amazingly toasty! As someone that is a lizard person and can’t warm up a blanket to save their life, this blanket gets toasty even off my minuscule temperature output.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was not the blanket I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for "heated blanket"'when this blanket showed up in the result as an "Amazon choice". Not realizing it wasn't heated (obviously I didn't read the details) I placed my order. THE SOFTEST BLANKET EVER!!!! Initially I was going to send it back, but after opening the box and touching the fabric, my intent dissolved. If clouds had a texture...this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with this blanket
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this blanket! It’s super soft and I’ve washed it with no issues. I ordered the grey one and it is a little blueish grey but I don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and very comfy, I love it! I ordered Queen size, which my bed is a queen and it looks bigger than my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah R

customer_reviews.title: Okay blanket; good for dog
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, light weight, a little thinner than I'd expected/hoped for. UPDATE: seam ripped after 6 months. I use it for my dog's bed now in winter.
customer_reviews.author: C. J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is amazing! Only one I cover up with. Appears to be thin but oh so warm!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: First box waa delivered not sealed as they just threw ...
customer_reviews.text: First box waa delivered not sealed as they just threw the two itens in the box. Searched for electric blanket on site and this came up under the listing. Not what i wanted immediately sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: DAs Me

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket was not what I expected. It was poorly made and it looked like someone had already returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Matteo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: but it is a nice and comfy blanket
customer_reviews.text: It's not a heated blanket, despite showing up top in the search results as one, but it is a nice and comfy blanket. Cat hair won't stick to it, and it's easily washed. I'm going to keep the blanket because it's good quality and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I use this blanket so much, and it is so comfortable and soft! And it’s giant!! I honestly love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: xx

customer_reviews.title: Strong yet soft.
customer_reviews.text: For this price you can not better item it is just like the description. Super soft and huge my family including our cats love this blanket. Will end up buying it again I think! We have washed it a few times and no shrinkage or tearing its holding up well for all the use it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Yooper30

customer_reviews.title: got lost
customer_reviews.text: got lost in the mail, so ill never know, but i assume its soft.
customer_reviews.author: skaie

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, beautifully silky!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this blanket. It's silky and has a beautiful sheen. It's the perfect weight for keeping warm on cool nights.
customer_reviews.author: SKR

customer_reviews.title: It sheds a lot.
customer_reviews.text: The description said it doesn't shed. It sheds like hell, would not recommend to anyone. Thought it would go away after the first time, tried washing it but it did not help. Not happy about this purchase what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordering Another One As We Speak
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket so much I'm ordering another one to have a backup
customer_reviews.author: Jordy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  Sooooo Soft!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down, the softest blanket I’ve ever owned. It’s super cozy and the color was true to the photos. It also didn’t have any type of chemical smell when I opened the package & was able to use immediately. It’s the perfect weight and size and I wouldn’t hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Its so soft and so warm.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it yesterday,i love it. Have 2 cat that sleep on my bed and shed. Simple lint roller removes shedded hairs. Im happy. May get a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. Will definitely be buying more! The whole family wants their own.
customer_reviews.author: SnS

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and feel but a bit slippery. Now I have the knack of keeping it in place.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is light and warm but it is hard to keep tucked in and it can slip right off the bed. Still, it is so good that I just had to get another for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos D. Pinkstaff

customer_reviews.title: New favorite blanket
customer_reviews.text: Don’t normally write reviews, but just opened package and this is hands down my new favorite go-to blanket, I highly recommend it. Feels like silk, and is light and warm... this is perfect for a gift of any kind, and you can’t beat it for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome blanket. I am a truck driver and this ...
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome blanket. I am a truck driver and this is a solid blanket IMO. It is soft and a great light blanket.
customer_reviews.author: richardv

customer_reviews.title: softest blanket ever
customer_reviews.text: love the fact that it is long on both sides and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: T J

customer_reviews.title: Not electric but cozy
customer_reviews.text: Large blanket, nice color, comfy to cuddle with. I'm using it in my office to combat excessively cold AC and it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah W.

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is awesome. Nice and soft and very warm
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is awesome. Nice and soft and very warm. Washed weekly since purchase and it has held up fine, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Steffen

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have gotten I like them so much. My daughter took over the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Jinelle E

customer_reviews.title: NOT Electric Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is NOT electric blanket. It came up when I searched on electric blanket so I assumed it was electric. My sister liked it regardless because it is soft. But I’m a little take back and felt con’ed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is silky, velvety, soft and very warm
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this blanket. When I first ordered it, I was searching for electric blankets, so I was expecting an electric blanket. However, this blanket is silky, velvety, soft and very warm. I bought the full size but I double it over for use on the couch. It's the gray color and it matches my décor. I recommend this blanket for anyone who is looking for a warm luxurious blanket,
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Plato

customer_reviews.title: I bought this unsure of the quality but I love it. Soft and larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unsure of the quality but I love it. Soft and larger than expected. Good quality and nice, consistent color.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The price is good and the quality is even better. It retained softness even after a wash.
customer_reviews.author: annafina

customer_reviews.title: My Linus Blanket ;)
customer_reviews.text: Bought on accident.....thought it was electric. But no way was I sending this comfy cozy back after snuggling in it! SUPER SOFT AND COZY!
customer_reviews.author: Free2juztB0121

customer_reviews.title: They are great. So soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these blankets. They are great. So soft and warm, it is the only blanket I need...when I usually layer up.
customer_reviews.author: Wendilc93

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and doesn't fall apart in the washing machine
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and doesn't fall apart in the washing machine! I tend to just sleep wrapped up in this, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ktritch6

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is fantastic! I've had it for nearly two months and ...
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is fantastic! I've had it for nearly two months and it's been great. It hasn't shed at all and has stayed super warm and soft even after being washed. It's a huge, wonderfully soft blanket that is well worth the relatively low price.

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loves it! It's not THE softest, but it is super soft. What any girl would want. Perfect gift!

customer_reviews.title: Not very warm
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery! The blanket is very soft and nice but it has little loose pieces that stick to my bed and clothing :( I was also expecting something to keep me warmer but oh well.

product_meta.title: Balichun Queen Size Soft Blanket,Super Warm,Luxury,Lightweight,Fuzzy,Fleece Blanket All Season for Couch,Sofa,Bed Blanket 90x90 Inch
feature_bullets: FEATURES and DURABILITY - Stay warm and cozy all year long with Balichun Super Soft Fleece Blanket. It is very soft and ventilated, makes it a good choice for household,camping, office and backpacking. Lightweight makes it easier for storage. It is also a multi-purpose, superior durable and extra warm blanket, but won't be too hot. Great present idea
Material- Made of 100 percent polyester, 330 GSM, with great quality and superior softness. Winter warm and summer light, all year-round use

SIZE COLOR and COZINESS - Balichun Super Soft Fleece Blanket is available in travel/throw, twin, queen and king sizes.Travel/Throw size: 50" x 61"; Twin size: 66" x 90"; Queen size: 90" x 90"; King size:90" x 108". Blanket is perfect for snuggling.It is ideal to use as a part of bedding or to wrap up in while watching television, reading a book or just relaxing. Varied color choices of Grey, Dark Grey, Ivory, Lake Blue, Royal Blue, Brown, Green, Silver Grey, Tan is also an added benefit of Balichun Super Soft Fleece Blanket

EASY WASH and CARE - Very easy to care for your blanket. Just machine wash on cold and air dry. Made with shrink resistant fabric. Stays the same and as new, after every wash. Always wash fleece alone or with other fleece blankets and clothing that is similar in texture to prevent abrasion. Never use bleach on a fleece blanket

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We think you're going to love this blanket as much as we do. But in case you don't, just return it within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked. We want our customers to be 100 percent happy
